languages.text: "Как прикажете... шерин". {n}Джай искоса смотрит на вас, и в глазах ее застыла обида. Веки опускаются, и слеза вымывает горечь из ее взгляда. Он вновь полон вежливой любезности... словно прекрасная раковина умершего и истлевшего моллюска.{/n}

"Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете... шерин". {n}Джай искоса смотрит на вас, и в глазах ее застыла обида. Веки опускаются, и слеза вымывает горечь из ее взгляда. Он вновь полон вежливой любезности... словно прекрасная раковина умершего и истлевшего моллюска.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

"Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

"Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

languages.text: “随便你怎么说吧……亲爱的。”{n}婕伊看着你，眼神冰冷而悲怆。她眨了眨眼睛，泪水冲掉了眼神中的哀伤。她的眼神再次变得充满了礼貌……仿佛美丽的贝壳，里面的贝类早已死亡、腐烂。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “随便你怎么说吧……亲爱的。”{n}婕伊看着你，眼神冰冷而悲怆。她眨了眨眼睛，泪水冲掉了眼神中的哀伤。她的眼神再次变得充满了礼貌……仿佛美丽的贝壳，里面的贝类早已死亡、腐烂。{/n}

languages.text: 「アンタがそう言うなら…シェリーン」{n}ジェイは訝しげにあなたを見る。その目は傷で凍っている。彼女は、まばたきをし、涙がそのまなざしから悲しみを洗い流す。彼女の目は再び礼節で満たされた…死んで腐りきった遺体を包み込む、美しい貝殻のように{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「アンタがそう言うなら…シェリーン」{n}ジェイは訝しげにあなたを見る。その目は傷で凍っている。彼女は、まばたきをし、涙がそのまなざしから悲しみを洗い流す。彼女の目は再び礼節で満たされた…死んで腐りきった遺体を包み込む、美しい貝殻のように{/n}

languages.text: «Lo que usted diga... shereen». {n}Jae te mira de reojo, con los ojos helados por el dolor. Parpadea y las lágrimas borran el pesar de la mirada. Sus ojos vuelven a estar llenos de educada cortesía... como una preciosa caracola que oculta un molusco muerto y putrefacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo que usted diga... shereen». {n}Jae te mira de reojo, con los ojos helados por el dolor. Parpadea y las lágrimas borran el pesar de la mirada. Sus ojos vuelven a estar llenos de educada cortesía... como una preciosa caracola que oculta un molusco muerto y putrefacto.{/n}

languages.text: « Si tu le dis... shereen. » {n}Jae vous lance un regard glacial et empli de douleur. Elle cligne des yeux et son chagrin semble emporté par les larmes. Elle retrouve sa politesse courtoise... comme un magnifique coquillage qui renfermerait un mollusque en décomposition.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si tu le dis... shereen. » {n}Jae vous lance un regard glacial et empli de douleur. Elle cligne des yeux et son chagrin semble emporté par les larmes. Elle retrouve sa politesse courtoise... comme un magnifique coquillage qui renfermerait un mollusque en décomposition.{/n}

languages.text: "Wie Ihr meint ... Shereen." {n}Jae blickt dich misstrauisch an, ihre Augen sind eisig und zeigen, wie verletzt sie ist. Sie blinzelt und ihre Tränen wischen ihr Trauer aus dem Gesicht. Dann kommt die Höflichkeit zurück in ihre Augen ... wie eine schöne Muschel, die eine tote und verrottete Moluske in sich aufgenommen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr meint ... Shereen." {n}Jae blickt dich misstrauisch an, ihre Augen sind eisig und zeigen, wie verletzt sie ist. Sie blinzelt und ihre Tränen wischen ihr Trauer aus dem Gesicht. Dann kommt die Höflichkeit zurück in ihre Augen ... wie eine schöne Muschel, die eine tote und verrottete Moluske in sich aufgenommen hat.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen nasıl istersen... Şirinim." {n}Jae sana yan yan bakıyor. Bakışları incinmişlikle dolu ve buz gibi. Gözlerini kırpıyor ve yaşlar, bu hüznü yıkayıp temizliyor. Gözleri bir kez daha nezaket ve incelikle doluyor. Güzel bir kabın, ölü ve çürümüş bir balçıkla dolması gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Whatever you say... shereen." {n}Jae looks askance at you, her eyes icy with hurt. She blinks and tears wash the sorrow from her gaze. Her eyes are once more filled with polite courtesy... like a beautiful shell containing a dead and rotten mollusc.{/n}
